summary: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.
cast: Bette Midler|Alan Bates|Frederic Forrest|Harry Dean Stanton|Barry Primus|David Keith|Sandra McCabe|Will Hare|Rudy Bond|Don Calfa|James Keane|Doris Roberts|Sandy Ward|Michael Greer|Kenny Sacha|Michael St. Laurent|Sylvester|Pearl Heart|Butch Ellis|Richard Dioguardi|John Dennis Johnston|Jonathan Banks|Jack O'Leary|Luke Andreas|Harry Northup|Cherie Latimer|Seamon Glass|Pat Corley|Dennis Erdman|Hugh Gillin|Joyce Roth|Frank Speiser|Constance Cawlfield|Annie McGuire|Hildy Brooks|Jack Starrett|Dimo Condos|Lorrie Davis|David Garfield|Kathryn Grody|Jack Hollander|Sandra Seacat|Chip Zien|Ted Harris|Victor Argo|Kelly Boyd|Cyndi Gottfried|L.D.
